mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE (ARTICLE_NO, ARTICLE_CODE, ARTICLE_TITLE, ARTICLE_CONTENT, USER_ID, WRITE_DATE, ARTICLE_IMAGE, VIEW_COUNT) VALUES (ARTICLE_SEQ.nextval, #{articleCode}, #{articleTitle}, #{articleContent}, #{userId}, sysdate, #{articleImage} , 0)
mapper.update: update ARTICLE set ARTICLE_TITLE = #{articleTitle}, ARTICLE_CONTENT = #{articleContent}, WRITE_DATE = sysdate, ARTICLE_IMAGE= #{articleImage} where ARTICLE_NO = #{articleNo}
update ARTICLE set VIEW_COUNT = (select VIEW_COUNT from ARTICLE where ARTICLE_NO = #{articleNo})+1 where ARTICLE_NO = #{articleNo}
